About

I’m a software engineer with a background in economics and mathematics, completing an M.S. in Software Engineering at West Virginia University. I’ve worked across analysis, QA, and full-stack development, and I build with curiosity, intention, and a focus on useful outcomes.

Education

  • M.S. Software Engineering — West Virginia University (2023–2026)
  • B.A. Economics & Management, Minor in Mathematics — Albion College (2012–2016)
  • Undergraduate Certificate, Pure Mathematics — Indiana University East (2018–2019)
